experiences.work_done: Develop system applications for the SmartBox 2 AOSP, SmartBox 2 ATV and SmartBox 3 ATV product lines including OTA firmware update applications, Security Uboot, Security Setting.# Research and develop solutions for the product line SmartBox product # Build SmartBox terminal management system - TMS (Terminal Management system) # Develop eSOP deployment applications using Flutter & Dart for SmartBox product line
